summary: RELEASED BRAKE, STARTED ROLLING FORWARD TO CROSS TRAFFIC, STEP ON ACCELERATOR AND NOTHING HAPPENED.  NO ENGINE REV OR ANYTHING.  PUMPED ACCELERATOR MANY TIMES AND FINALLY ENGINE ENGAGED.  NEARLY CAUSING PASSENGER SIDE TO BE HIT BY ONCOMING TRAFFIC.  THIS HAS HAPPENED IN SIMILAR SITUATIONS WITH BOTH MY WIFE AND MYSELF DRIVING.  *TR
